meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jackie Ron Trigueiro Jack Lowe Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #820.

div.div:
Ron Trigueiro game 1.
Missing introduction and first 27 clues of the Jeopardy! Round.

td.p: Ron Trigueiro, a student from Carruthers, California
Jack Lowe, a pediatrician from Rockville, Maryland (whose 2-day cash winnings total $31,410)

aesthesia & anesthesia (awake & asleep)

Jack
')

Ron

toggle('clue_DJ_5_5', 'clue_DJ_5_5_stuck', 'Dean Martin & Jerry Lewis

Jack
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_6_5', 'clue_DJ_6_5_stuck', '(Jack: What is Hawaii?)
...
[Applause for Ron running the category.]

Rhode Island

JackRon
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_6_5', 'clue_DJ_6_5_stuck', 'All 5 counties in this "Ocean State" have direct water access to the Atlantic')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: All 5 counties in this "Ocean State" have direct water access to the Atlantic

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
JackieWhat is Samoa?
$6,200
JackWhat is Fiji?
$6,690
RonWhat is Fiji?
$2,000
Fiji')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'After a 9/25/87 coup, this South Pacific island severed its 113-year link with the British crown')

tr.td: After a 9/25/87 coup, this South Pacific island severed its 113-year link with the British crown
2nd place: a trip on Delta to Puerto Vallarta, Mexico & stay at Villa Del Mar Resort
3rd place: an American Flyer Caravelle collection luggage

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
